item.title: About
item.description: Many Chinese companies dream about successfully expanding their business overseas, particularly in established markets such as Europe and the United States.

item.title: About the owner
item.description: Mr. A. Jeremy van der Velden LL.M. is an alumni of Leiden University (Netherlands) and has been working as an established consultant for more than 10 years.

item.title: Business in Europe (exploring the European market)
item.description: Many Chinese companies dream about successfully expanding their business overseas, particularly in established markets such as Europe and the United States.

item.title: Business planning
item.description: The Chinese market is highly competitive and Chinese companies continuously need to adapt in order to stay in business. In contrast, CBC has experienced that Chinese companies taking their business overseas do not always succeed adjusting their business culture to the European market, leading to the loss of important opportunities.

item.title: Communication
item.description: Communication is key for any enterprise operating internationally. CBC has experienced that, even though business partners speak the same language, communication can nevertheless still be challenging.

item.title: fees
item.description: Starting a cooperation with a local consultant doesn’t need to be expensive. Established firms, such as Houthoff Buruma (legal) or KPGM, are reliable partners.

item.title: Getting started: setting up an overseas branch
item.description: Setting up an overseas branch in the Netherlands is no walk in the park. Like in any other place, there are various rules to follow.

item.title: Legal support services
item.description: Because of CBC’s extensive experience in advising and consulting companies in- and outside China, CBC knows what legal challenges you might come across.

item.title: The Netherlands and its business climate
item.description: The Netherlands is a located in western Europe and has recently become more popular amongst Chinese enterprises developing business in Europe.

item.title: workshops
item.description: Because making the first steps is always hard, CBC offers workshops in both China and the Netherlands to introduce you to entering the European market.
